text: William Berewald (August 5, 1874 - April 15, 1963) was an American gymnast. He competed in four events at the 1904 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1874 births Category:1963 deaths Category:American male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of the United States Category:Gymnasts at the 1904 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Cleveland
title: William Berewald
